Articles.Content:
I have been trying to use the combination of LALT+F5 to make a named quicksave, however no dialogue to name the quicksave appeared. Pressing F5 on its own creates a quicksave as expected. 

Also, when trying other key combinations that require the MOD key, I noticed they don't work either. For example, MOD+F9 and MOD+F12. I assumed that perhaps I was wrong about my MOD key so I checked the settings.cfg file in \Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\ and it indicates the MOD key is: 

MODIFIER_KEY
{
	primary = LeftAlt
	secondary = RightAlt
	group = 0
	modeMask = -1
	modeMaskSec = -1

 

I am not sure what might be wrong. If anyone has any suggestions I'd appreciate it!

Are you entirely sure your keyboards ALT key isn't just broken?

Can you use it correctly for things other than KSP?

Have you tried changing the MOD key to something else and see if that works?

For some reason - the LeftAlt key is used in another section (see below)

I havent done any testing yet..

I do have a couple mods like realplume, and evironmental effects.. installed with ckan

I dont know enough about the mods to know if they are invilved..

EVA_ToggleMovementMode
{
    primary = LeftAlt
    secondary = None
    group = 268435456
    modeMask = -1
    modeMaskSec = -1
}
